title: Lazada Offsite Campaign Report
description: Schema for Lazada's offsite campaign report.

Date.description: The date of the campaign report in the format 'dd-MM-yyyy'.

Campaign_ID.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

Funding_Type.description: The type of funding for the campaign (e.g., 'Partnership Assisted').

Seller_ID.description: The unique identifier for the seller.

Shop_Name.description: The name of the seller's shop.

Site.description: The site where the campaign is hosted (e.g., 'Mix').

Offer_ID.description: The unique identifier for the campaign offer.

Ad_Content.description: The content of the campaign advertisement (e.g., 'RL_1111').

Platform.description: The platform where the campaign is running (e.g., 'iPhone OS').

Visits.description: The total number of visits to the campaign.

Unique_Visitors.description: The total number of unique visitors to the campaign.

PDP_PV.description: The total page views on the product display page (PDP).

A2C_PV.description: The total page views on the 'Add to Cart' page (A2C).

Units_Sold.description: The total number of units sold during the campaign.

Orders.description: The total number of orders placed during the campaign.

Item_Conversion_Rate.description: The item conversion rate, represented as a decimal (e.g., 0.4292).
